articles.title: U.S. halves isolation for asymptomatic COVID cases to 5 days - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Authorities change guidance based on 'protection provided by vaccination'
articles.content:
U.S. health authorities on Monday shortened the recommended isolation time for Americans with asymptomatic cases of COVID-19 to five days from the previous guidance of 10 days.
